itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 76 Part 2 : Dr. Steven C. Harper
title: Doctrine & Covenants 76 Part 2 : Dr. Steven C. Harper
description:
Dr. Harper returns with Hank and John to discuss how Section 76 elaborates when Paul says that we can be “joint-heirs with Christ.” We hear Dr. Harper share why he reveres Joseph Smith and what Dr. Harper feels are Joseph’s greatest gifts. Join us with one of the Church’s foremost historians to  discuss one of the most profound revelations of this dispensation.

Shownotes: https://followhim.co/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
